Content.Text:
<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Mr. Bunny! Mr. Bunny, where are you?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah, <MYNAME>! Have you seen Mr. Bunny
around?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
He hid in my bag when I left the Safari, and I
didn't know he was there until I got all the way
back!
<PAGE>
I only caught sight of him when he jumped out
of my bag and disappeared in the bushes. Now I
can't find him anywhere!
<PAGE>
There are lots of foxes around here, and they
don't get along with bunnies at all. I'm worried
that if I don't find him soon, he'll...rrrg...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Thank you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm sorry, but I have to get going. I really need to
get back to find Mr. Bunny, post haste!
<PAGE>
If you see him anywhere, could you please catch
him for me? I'd be most appreciative!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
You will? Yay! Thank you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I was just thinking to myself how impossible it
would be to search the whole mountainside for
a single bunny all by my lonesome.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But with your help, <MYNAME>, it'll be
hundreds of times easier! Thank you! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's hurry up and start looking. I'm sure Mr.
Bunny must be very lonely out here all by
himself!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I can't find him anywhere! Where has he gotten
himself off to?!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Where have you been? We've been worried sick
about you! You haven't gotten yourself hurt,
now, have you?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's good. I'm glad to hear it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>But you were a very bad bunny to go running off
by yourself. Bad bunny!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, thank you for joining the search
effort.
<PAGE>
You helped me find Mr. Bunny before anything
terrible happened.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now I should go take Mr. Bunny back home, so
if you'll excuse me...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? It's dark out, so you want to escort me
back home, you say?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'll be okay. There aren't any nocturnal animals
around town who'd pose any threat, like lions or
jaguars.
<PAGE>
I'm not in any danger at all, believe me!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's not what you meant? Um...so am I in
danger from something else?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Well, if you're that concerned for my safety, I'd
be happy to let you escort me!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh. You're such a nice, responsible person,
<MYNAME>. Thank you!
